channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Congress erupts at Trump's shutdown mass firings: "This is a disaster"
item.description: Members of Congress pushed back Friday against the White House announcing layoffs of federal workers as part of the government shutdown. Why it matter...

item.title: Scoop: Trump administration warns of "insufficient funds" for food stamps if shutdown continues
item.description: The Trump administration is warning states that there will be "insufficient funds" to pay full Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefi...

item.title: Qatar to build air force facility on U.S. base in Idaho
item.description: Qatar will build an Air Force facility at Idaho's Mountain Home Airbase to host its F-15 jets and train pilots, the U.S. and Qatar jointly announced o...

item.title: Trump officials say "substantial" federal worker layoffs have begun
item.description: The Trump administration has begun its much-anticipated layoffs of federal workers, Office of Management and Budget Director Russell Vought announced ...

item.title: Trump threatens 100% tariff on Chinese goods over over rare earth restrictions
item.description: President Trump threatened to cancel his upcoming meeting with President Xi Jinping after China announced plans to restrict access to minerals critica...

item.title: Shutdown cracks, Jay Jones’s texts, Trump’s Gaza deal
item.description: Republicans showed cracks in their messaging around the government shutdown, Attorney General Pam Bondi sparred with senators and other highlights fro...

item.title: Trump announces new 100 percent tariffs on China
item.description: President Donald Trump said he is unhappy about China’s “hostile” move to limit access to rare minerals and may cancel a meeting with Xi Jinping.

item.title: Trump to announce drug-price deal with AstraZeneca
item.description: The pharmaceutical giant would be the second company to publicly agree to the Trump’s administration’s push for lower drug prices.

item.title: Trump eyes a triumphal arch to mark America’s 250th anniversary
item.description: The arch would be constructed across from the Lincoln Memorial, on a small patch of federal land currently occupied by a traffic circle.

item.title: Some House GOP lawmakers want to get back to work
item.description: The House has not been in session for several weeks amid the shutdown. Some GOP lawmakers say it’s time for it to return.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
